body_html:
Ah! I see your problem. We don't think the CPU JIT is ready for wide use yet, so it does not get enabled globally via OptimizerOptions. (The GPU JIT can be enabled via OptimizerOptions.)

Try marking some operators to compile using the "manual" approach described here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/jit
body_text:
Ah! I see your problem. We don't think the CPU JIT is ready for wide use yet, so it does not get enabled globally via OptimizerOptions. (The GPU JIT can be enabled via OptimizerOptions.)
Try marking some operators to compile using the "manual" approach described here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/jit
body:
Ah! I see your problem. We don't think the CPU JIT is ready for wide use yet, so it does not get enabled globally via OptimizerOptions. (The *GPU* JIT can be enabled via OptimizerOptions.)

Try marking some operators to compile using the "manual" approach described here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/jit
